Title: Starred Up
Actors: Jack O'Connell, Gilly Gilchrist, Frederick Schmidt, Edna Caskey
Plot: Eric Love, 19, is locked up in prison. On his first day, he assaults another inmate and several guards. He's offered group therapy and his dad, an inmate as well, tries to talk sense into him. Can he be rehabilitated?
Production: Sigma, Lipsync Productions, Film4, Quickfire Films, Creative Scotland, Northern Ireland Screen
